howItWorksSteps.title: Upload
howItWorksSteps.desc: Securely upload one or multiple MRI DICOM/PNG slices.

howItWorksSteps.title: Analyze
howItWorksSteps.desc: Our AI analyzes the scans and highlights regions of interest with confidence scores.

howItWorksSteps.title: Report
howItWorksSteps.desc: Export clinician-ready reports (PDF) and review detailed visualizations.

exampleOutcome.heading: Example outcome
exampleOutcome.title: Glioma detected
exampleOutcome.note: Region highlighted and suggested follow-up: Biopsy and consult neuro-oncology.
